snippet: The abundance of Republican elected officials in the state precludes Democrats from having much of a "bench" -- and may prevent them from making a strong run at either Senate seat in 2014.
abstract: The abundance of Republican elected officials in the state precludes Democrats from having much of a "bench" -- and may prevent them from making a strong run at either Senate seat in 2014.

headline.main: Two Senate Seats in South Carolina, but Few Democratic Prospects
